quiz.text: Recently (April 2023), India’s first "Water Metro" services has been inaugurated in which of the following places?

quiz.text: Asia’s first mobile biosafety level-3 (BSL-3) laboratory named RAMBAAN, designed to investigate emerging viral infections has been showcased at the G20 Health Working Group meeting in Goa. What is the full form of RAMBAAN?

Rapid Action Mobile BSL-3 Advanced Augmented Navigation

None of the above
